column4: hey - i saw a buddys ubuntu the other day - and he has a really neat window manger where he can turn all his windows open, into 4 small equally seperate windows on his desktop
what is that that does that?
Compiz has an effect like that, I think. You need to install the Compiz manager. (I think, I'll check for you...)
Open your Applications->Ubuntu Software Center and search for Compiz
